value: Which people founded the settlement of Pintia?|The Vaccaei
What was the main funerary ritual of the Vaccaei in the necropolis of Las Ruedas?|Cremation with personal belongings
What event caused the destruction of the city of Las Quintanas?|A fire, possibly during the Roman conquest
What materials were used to build the houses of the Vaccaei city?|Adobe
What is the name of the artisan quarter of Pintia and what was the main activity carried out there?|Carralace単a, pottery production
What unique discovery was made in the kilns of Carralace単a?|A kiln with a 5-meter-diameter grill, unique in Europe
What happened to the treasures buried by the inhabitants of Pintia?|They were found during excavations, such as jewelry and coins
Where can pieces recovered from Pintia be observed?|At the Valladolid Museum and the Archaeological Classroom of Pintia
What did the limestone steles in the necropolis of Las Ruedas signify?|They indicated the location of the burials
What is recreated in the Archaeological Classroom of Pintia?|Houses, a Vaccaei street, pottery workshops, and funerary rituals
